original_text: Instead, he bought you with the very valuable blood of Christ, who died as a sacrifice for our sins. He died like a lamb that is completely good and has nothing wrong with it.
korean_text: 오직 흠 없고 점 없는 어린 양 같은 그리스도의 보배로운 피로 된 것이니라

sentences.original_text: with the very valuable blood of Christ
who died as a sacrifice for our sins
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 우리 죄를 위한 제물로 죽으셨습니다

sentences.original_text: and has nothing wrong with it
